common

Interface ICRCmd2ModelAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICmd2ModelAdapter<IReceiver,ICRMessageType>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILocalCmd2ModelAdapter, IServerCRCmd2ModelAdapter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerCRCmd2ModelAdapter

    public interface ICRCmd2ModelAdapter
extends ICmd2ModelAdapter<IReceiver,ICRMessageType>
    This adapter is for the externally-sourced commands to interact with the local system, specifically the DataPacketCRAlgoCmd. Here we specify the target recipient in sendTo() method to IReceiver type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      <T extends ICRMessageType>
      void      		 sendToChatRoom(java.lang.Class<T> id, T data)
      Send a data packet to the chat room corresponding with the receiver
